data.title: Campus Map and Directions
data.meta_site_name: Salem College - Situated in Winston-Salem, NC, Salem is an intimate learning community of women from all over the world and is one of our nation’s most distinguished private liberal arts colleges.
data.text:
The Elberson Fine Arts Center parking lot can be found by using the East Campus entrance. The address is 412 Rams Drive, Winston-Salem, NC 27101.

From west of Winston-Salem:

Take I-40 East to Winston-Salem; exit onto Business 40. Take the Salem College/Old Salem exit. At the end of the ramp, turn left. Travel one-half block on South Liberty Street. Turn left onto Cemetery Street; follow it until it ends at Salem Avenue and turn right. At the intersection of Salem Avenue and Rams Drive (formerly Stadium Drive), turn right into the Robert E. Elberson Fine Arts Center entrance; proceed to the bottom of the hill.

From east of Winston-Salem:

Take I-40 West to Winston-Salem; exit onto Business 40. Take the Old Salem/Salem College exit, which is US 52 South. Go a quarter-mile before taking the Research Parkway exit. At the end of the ramp, go west on Research Parkway. Enter the traffic circle and take the first right onto Salem Avenue. Go to the first stoplight and turn left. At the top of the hill, go straight into the Robert E. Elberson Fine Arts Center entrance; proceed to the bottom of the hill.

Hanes Auditorium and Shirley Recital Hall in the Robert E. Elberson Fine Arts Center are wheelchair accessible.

The Club Dining Room is located on the ground floor of Corrin Refectory on the Salem College campus. Please park at the Robert E. Elberson Fine Arts Center. Take the red brick sidewalk to the right of the Elberson Fine Arts Center into the center of campus, past the May Dell, the Rondthaler Science Building, and the Student Center (all on your left). Take the stairs just past the Student Center and follow the sidewalk to the back of the Corrin Refectory and the accessible ramp to the entrance of the Club Dining Room.

Gramley Library Assembly Room is on the third floor of Gramley Library, located on Church Street on Salem College’s campus. It is located on the Salem Square at the corner of Church and West Streets, and across from Babcock Residence Hall.

For those with disabilities who need an elevator, the Library is wheelchair accessible. When entering the front door, please look to the left before the glass doors. There is a door where a buzzer can be pressed to alert someone to help patrons.

From the Elberson Fine Arts Center parking lot:

Please park at the Robert E. Elberson Fine Arts Center. Take the red brick sidewalk to the right of the Elberson Fine Arts Center into the center of Campus, past the May Dell and the Rondthaler Science Building on the left. Take the stairs just before the Student Center on the left. Go down several groups of stairs. The entrance to Bryant Hall is on your right. The Fitness Center is on the third floor; Bryant Hall and the gym are located on the ground floor.

Bryant Hall Address: 790 East Salem Ave., Winston-Salem, NC 27101
